metadata.title: CVE-2011-3707 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - negligible
metadata.description: JanRain PHP OpenID library (aka php-openid) 2.2.2 allows remote attackersto obtain sensitive information via a direct request to a .php file, whichreveals the installation path in an error message, as demonstrated byAuth/Yadis/Yadis.php and certain other files.

criterions.comment: php-openid: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'see notes').
